title: Sunny and Renovated in Coventry Village of Cleveland Hts by CCF CWRU
neighborhood: Cleveland Heights near Cleveland Clinic Univ Hosp CWRU Med
posting_body: Welcome to the popular Coventry Village Neighborhood.
Prime building in a prime location with old world charm found in a brownstone walk-up.
Spacious two bedroom suite has hardwood floors throughout with high ceilings.
Bath is marble from floor to ceiling.
Dining room has charming built-in corner cabinets.
Living room has decorative brick fireplace.
Eat-in kitchen has nice cabinetry, granite countertops, dishwasher, and disposal.
Charming archway between dining and living room provides open floor plan.
Ceiling fans in the living room, dining room, and bedroom provide for great circulation.
Living room and Dining rooms have great storage closets.
New windows for energy efficiency and sound barriers.
Conveniently located close to the common laundry facility on-site.
Off-street parking available.
Located in the Heart of Coventry Village -  a convenient walking neighborhood.

Literally a few second walk  to groceries, banks, library, coffee shop (free wi-fi), sports bars, sandwich shops, pizza shop, frozen yogurt parlor, video store, yoga studio, hair salon, drycleaners, bookstore, drug store, music store, nostalgic toy store, hardware store, clothing store, flower shop, sports bar, clubs with live music, 21 restaurants including outdoor dining, and the Peace Park.

Close to the Cleveland Clinic Foundation, Lerner College of Medicine, Case Medical School,  Case Dental School, Huron Road Hospital, VA Hospital, Metro General Hospital, Hillcrest Hospital, Ahuja Hospital and University Hospital.
On the loop of Case Western Reserve University, near Case Law School, Cleveland State University, and John Carroll University.
Call 216 536-64O5 (no random texts, please) for more information or to schedule an appointment.
If replying to this ad via email, please provide your name and phone number.
Thank you
